product_name: The North Face Dolomite 3S Sleeping Bag
long_description: The North Face Dolomite 3S synthetic sleeping bag provides lightweight performance for a road trip or a weekend of summer camping. Heatseeker(TM) insulation offers a great warmth-to-weight ratio, is highly compressible and is extremely durable, making it ideal for cold weather. Features a zippered internal watch pocket to keep small necessities within easy reach. Shell is constructed of soft, ripstop nylon; polyester taffeta lining is soft next to skin. Zipper zips all the way around the footbox and allows the sleeping bag to be opened up completely for use as a comforter. The North Face Dolomite 3S sleeping bag includes a roll-top stuff sack.
short_description: The North Face Dolomite 3S synthetic sleeping bag provides lightweight performance for a road trip or a weekend of summer camping.
